title: Remove Facebook from Follow Us and remove Email from Contact (including footer)

requirements.text: Remove Email as a contact method from the Contact page so the page no longer shows an email icon, an "Email Us" label, or a mailto link/address.

quotes: can  u remove facebook in follow us and remove email in contacts please

acceptanceCriteria: The Contact page (frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx) no longer renders any Email section/card/row.
There is no mailto: link visible or present in the DOM on the Contact page.
No unused imports remain on the Contact page (e.g., Mail icon) after removal.

requirements.text: Remove Facebook from all "Follow Us" UI sections so the site no longer shows a Facebook link/icon/card anywhere it currently appears (including the Contact page and the site footer).

quotes: can  u remove facebook in follow us and remove email in contacts please

acceptanceCriteria: The Contact page social section no longer renders the Facebook card/link (and does not import/render the Facebook icon).
The footer "Follow Us" section no longer renders a Facebook icon/link (and does not import the Facebook icon).
Instagram remains available and unchanged in both places.

requirements.text: Remove Email from the footer contact area so the footer no longer displays an email address or mailto link; keep the phone number as the remaining contact detail.

quotes: Just tell me: should I also remove the email icon from the footer, or keep it there?

acceptanceCriteria: The footer (frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.tsx) no longer renders a mailto: link or email address.
The footer still renders the phone tel: link using the configured phone number.
No unused CONTACT_INFO.email references remain after the footer change.

requirements.text: Ensure the application builds and deploys successfully after removing Email and Facebook UI elements, making any minimal TypeScript/import/copy cleanups required to eliminate build errors.

quotes: ‚ùå Sorry, we couldn't generate your application
want me to try the build again?

acceptanceCriteria: The frontend builds without TypeScript or lint errors caused by removed imports/constants.
No runtime errors are introduced by the change (site loads and navigates to Contact page successfully).

constraints: Do not edit files under frontend/src/components/ui (read-only).
Do not modify immutable hook files (frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx).
Keep all user-facing text in English.
nonGoals: Do not add new social networks or new contact methods.
Do not implement or reintroduce cart/checkout flows.
Do not change WhatsApp or phone number behavior (beyond removing email/facebook UI as requested).
